DOC.brief_title: Transthoracic Incremental Monophasic Versus Biphasic Emergency Responders ( TIMBER )
DOC.detailed_description: The trial design determine whether two fully-FDA-approved , commercially available transthoracic defibrillation shock waveform comparable energy result improved patient outcome follow out-of-hospital cardiac arrest due ventricular fibrillation . Eligible subject include adult nontraumatic out-of-hospital cardiac arrest due ventricular fibrillation . Subjects cardiac arrest randomly allocate receive one two type defibrillation shock ( monophasic biphasic waveform ) resuscitation , addition include standard treatment . The primary endpoint admission alive hospital . Secondary endpoint include rhythm defibrillation shock , return spontaneous circulation , hospital discharge rate .
DOC.criteria: Adult victim nontraumatic outofhospital cardiac arrest due ventricular fibrillation Children Trauma
